flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=30>>30
Mars weighs 500 tons because 150 / 0.3 = <<150/0.3=500>>500
The moon weighs 205 tons because 500 / 2 = <<500/2=205>>205
#### 205

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 205. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
